m_szDocSumamry: News:Hydroxy Hydroxy or HHO in the News Commenced Fall, 2010 News relating to systems that use electrolysis to generate hydroxy gas for a variety of applications such as improving fuel mileage, cutting torches, or even running vehicles on water. 2015 Featured / Top 5 : Zeitgeist > 2015 Exotic Free Energy technology advancements in review; 2016 predictions - In 2015, we created a page featuring EIGHT of the best exotic free energy technologies now available for sale, mostly pre-orders, being in process of manufacturing. My vision for 2016 is that we have a global consciousness shift that makes
